grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 矛盾原理【ムジュンゲンリ】principle of contradiction (logic)
kun reading compounds: 矛【ほこ】long-handled Chinese spear, lance, pike, weapon, arms, grip of a bow, parade float decorated with long-handled Chinese spears
矛先【ほこさき】point of spear, spearhead, brunt, aim of attack, force of argument
銅矛【どうほこ】bronze hoko, bronze halberd, bronze spearhead
